name: Harambe Wisdom
description: $RAMBE is a DeFi token with a purpose, inspired by the legendary gorilla Harambe, who was killed in 2016 after a child fell into his enclosure. Harambe became a symbol of sacrifice, justice, and internet culture, and $RAMBE aims to honor his memory and legacy by creating an ecosystem of utilities and use cases that benefit both the holders and the world.
